Name: The Tide Intro
About the game: One day.. 'they' began to appear... No one knows where 'they' came from.. But one thing is clear that humans are confronting a life-and-death survival. 'The Tide Intro' is an IMMERSIVE VR bridge crossing experience that will make your palms sweat! FEATURES MISSION: Since giant fish apocalypse, barely no ground left for human as water level rises. Your only chance is a narrow bridge in front of you. Otherwise.. giant fish will eat you up! BE CAUTIOUS: Everything is unexpectd and unpredictable! Use flashlight(controller) to search a pitch-dark building thoroghly. You might come across something shockingly unimaginable! TO SURVIVE: How to cross the bridge safely? Follow the guided footsteps before you. TIME LIMIT: There is never ENOUGH time for survival. Remember, you need to hurry before the water rises.
Meta Title: The Tide Intro: Mar 3, 2020, Dexter Studios and Full Over...
Meta Description: Looking for information on The Tide Intro? Check out the release date (Mar 3, 2020), developer insights from Dexter Studios, and a complete game summary.
